candidates.name: Allan Baird
candidates.why_elect: I have a strong commercial and farming background. I have eight years on Federated Farmers Southland Executive, including three years as Provincial President. Our family are long standing Southland residents and I have two sons to whom I would desire a prosperous and positive region for their generation and future.
candidates.why_stand: Local government is an important part of our democracy and I have developed a good skill set to be of value to my community in this role.

candidates.name: Roger Hodgkinson
candidates.why_elect: I'm an ex sheep farmer, now residing in Te Anau. I'm an active advocate for coherent regional strategy and actively lobby decision makers. We must formulate/implement our own regional solutions before they are externally imposed! Our region will thrive into the future despite economic and environmental challenges.
candidates.why_stand: I am motivated to be nominated candidate for representing the Fiordland Constituency as I have moved their in the last 6 years and wish to actively contribute where I can, to help preserve both its spectacular natural environment and wildlife habitat of Fiordland National Park and adjoining farming region.
